name: milkyway-multimedia/ss-social-feed
description: Ability to display a social on a silverstripe website

suggest.guzzlehttp/oauth-subscriber: For Twitter & Smugmug Providers, you will need the Oauth1 Subscriber
suggest.league/oauth2-facebook: You will need Oauth2 authentication to unlock additional items to pull from a provider (such as Facebook ratings)
suggest.embed/embed: To allow more complex embeds for some social media provides (such as Youtube)
suggest.milkyway-multimedia/ss-mwm-formfields: To add location finding via Google, in order to find Google Places with just the address
